name: prism-scale
effect: Held by feebas : Holder evolves into milotic when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Feebas: Holder evolves into Milotic.

flavor_text.black_white: A mysterious scale that evolves certain Pokémon. It shines in rainbow colors.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A mysterious scale that evolves certain Pokémon. It shines in rainbow colors.
